title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs        Fall colors in the Big South Fork are spectacular. National Park Service       All media inquiries should be directed to the park’s Public Information Officer who may be contacted by: Writing Big South Fork National River and Recreation Area 4564 Leatherwood Road Oneida, TN 37841 Phone: 423-569-9778
